name: Eyeless Artist's Drawing Practice
description:
do you want to learn how to draw? or do you just need practice? either way then this program is for you! also if you get board of drawing and need a break then you can always play the built in mini game!

for real though I made this game in one night so its not the most polished thing you will ever see but it works fine. the way this program teaches you to draw is the same way I learned, and if you practice this technique enough then you'll be able to just look at a reference photo and draw it no problem.
